meta.title: From NEVER to SEEN
meta.author: Sandy Weisz and Mao Reynolds
meta.message: This week's Raddles are in honor of the upcoming season of "[Make Some Noise](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tKBcWn-tqWE)," which premieres on Monday, October 13. Each show features a set of improvisational prompts that — as emphasized by the host, Sam Reich, at the start — "the players have never seen before."

ladder.clue: Change one letter in <> to get an illness
{} <>, something you might have in the winter
An old-fashioned <> is made from giant {}s
ladder.transform: might be made of many a

ladder.clue: Append a letter to <> to get a certain mark
Change the double letter in <> to a single letter to get a basketball term
Drop one letter in <> to get something typically made on a birthday
Remove the middle letter from <> to be watched
